imdb.plot outline: In Complex TV's Magnum Opus, monumental records from our past are revisited. With in-depth interviews from the artists involved to first-hand accounts of respected rap peers and critics of the time, viewers get a blueprint of how the song was created, what impact it had, and how its legacy continues to live on.
imdb.title: Magnum Opus
plot: In Complex TV's _Magnum Opus_ (qv), monumental records from our past are revisited. With in-depth interviews from the artists involved to first-hand accounts of respected rap peers and critics of the time, viewers get a blueprint of how the song was created, what impact it had, and how its legacy continues to live on.::Edwin Ortiz
